name: First Security Services
short_description:
First Security Services has been protecting businesses, school districts, government facilities, healthcare facilities and industrial complexes for more than 46 years. The company, which began as a modest security force in Santa Cruz County, is now one of California’s premiere contract security providers. 

Through growth, experience, and acquisition, First Security Services has become a name widely recognized for safety and dependability. From its corporate headquarters in the Silicon Valley, and through its branch and satellite offices located in nearly every major city in the state, First Security Services maintains a team of more than 600 security professionals ready to deploy nearly at a moment’s notice.
